title: Bug on mouse-over of advertised spectate games:
body: The spectate section has a scripting error on mouse-over and on bottom left of screen also.

replies.body: Thanks for the report, KiStorm - we're investigating this now!
Seems to be fixed now; thanks for quick response =)
I gave up on making it work a long time ago. It's just something Riot don't seem to care about anymore.
